Hi Marcelo,

What is the problem you are facing? Only access to Swing compo=
nents needs to be done in the EDT, not the whole test.

If you cannot use F=
EST, simply copy the source (3 or 4 small classes) in the package org.fest.=
swing.edt. The license is Apache 2.0 (business friendly,) so you can use th=
e code as you wish.

I wrote a little blog entry about writing EDT-safe tes=
ts. You can find it at http://alexruiz.developerblogs.com/?p=3D160 . I hope=
 that helps :)

Cheers,
-Alex
